summary: This is an email from New York Times reporter Mihir Zaveri inquiring about reports that Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell, referencing an NBC New York article about a possible suicide attempt or assault. The email seeks confirmation and details about the incident and Epstein's current status.

persons.name: Mihir Zaveri
persons.context: Reporter at The New York Times who sent an email inquiry about reports of Jeffrey Epstein being injured in his jail cell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the inquiry, reported to have been found injured in his jail cell after a possible suicide attempt or assault.

connections.description: Zaveri is a reporter inquiring about Epstein's reported injury in jail.

events.title: Inquiry about Epstein's jail cell injury
events.description: New York Times reporter Mihir Zaveri sends an email inquiry about reports that Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell after a possible suicide attempt or assault.

keyFacts: On July 25, 2019, New York Times reporter Mihir Zaveri inquired about reports that Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell.
The inquiry references an NBC New York article suggesting the injury resulted from a possible suicide attempt or assault.
The email seeks to confirm the incident and obtain details about what happened and Epstein's current status.
